snippet.title: NEON PARASITE :: Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist the game on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1246620/Neon_Parasite

INFEST YOUR FRIENDS! Neon Parasite is a game of chaotic critter combat where you'll be hovering, shooting, and dashing your way around the competition to reign the most infested bug of all. This 4-player local party game boasts crazy strategic battles across a multitude of different arenas.
